result.reason: Search results hidden in collapsed folders reduce the effectiveness of the filter feature.
result.approach: Modify ConnectionTree.ApplyFilter to automatically call ExpandAll() when a filter is active, and implement logic to restore the previous expansion state when the filter is cleared.
